summary: This is an email from U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman summarizing a public statement regarding Prince Andrew's lack of cooperation with the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's crimes. Berman states that despite Andrew's public offer to cooperate, he has provided zero cooperation after being contacted by authorities.

events.title: Berman's public statement on Prince Andrew's non-cooperation
events.description: U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman publicly states that Prince Andrew has provided zero cooperation to the SDNY and FBI investigation into Epstein's crimes, despite his prior public offer to cooperate.

keyFacts: Prince Andrew publicly offered to cooperate with law enforcement investigating Jeffrey Epstein's crimes via a press release.
The Southern District of New York and the FBI contacted Prince Andrew's attorneys requesting an interview.
As of February 7, 2020, Prince Andrew had provided zero cooperation to the investigation.
